author: zulutu
content: I'm running Geth on a different machine and seeing the same bad voting that you are. I don't think it's related

author: zulutu
content:
Over the last 30 days I've voted incorrectly:

Head: 2.236%
Target: 0.524%
Source: 0.014%

All machines are well resourced.

author: zulutu
content: I'm running a _decent_ amount of validators so shouldn't be too skewed by sample size

author: potuz
content: 30 days averages are a little skewed, last 2 weeks have been way worse (quantitatively in my node and guessing on the number of complaints in prysm's discord). My 30 day average does go like yours, but I'm currently having 9-10 bad heads per validitor per day which is over 4%

author: zulutu
content: I'll check the last week 1 sec

author: potuz
content: But in my case I'm only running 2 validators so I can be skewed by sample size ðŸ˜†

author: potuz
content: In any case I think the correlation points not only about my own copy of geth, but also the block proposers

author: potuz
content: It's clear to me now that eth1 activity is delaying blocks

author: zulutu
content: interesting, these stats are much worse

author: zulutu
content: I get why the head would be worse, but why would the source vote nearly triple?
